comment._content: Fourth escalator not yet installed. Stairs are no longer readily accessible. Otherwise, pretty similar today

comment.author: 43322036@N04
comment._content: Are these the same escalators that are still there today? the ones that lead up towards York st?

comment.author: 61625699@N00
comment._content: Gorgeous, I'm glad they're still there. I wish they'd do some restoration on them though, bring out their true beauty.

comment.author: 57994656@N05
comment._content: You can only do so much with escalators over the years. After 80 year I would be surprised if some parts might be rusted despite all the oiling and maintenance that they do.

comment.author: 27331537@N06
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/yumanuma] You might like this 1931 view of the escalators. AB

comment.author: 37922909@N06
comment._content: They have just replaced the treads on them.  May have done some other work but that is the most visible
